text:
Use cofunction identities and trig identities to find the indicated trig functions

\begin{array}{l}\n\sin 60^{\circ}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}, \cos 60^{\circ}=\frac{1}{2} \\\n\tan 60^{\circ}=\n\end{array}[imath]\sin 60^{\circ}=\frac{\sqrt{3}}{2}, \cos 60^{\circ}=\frac{1}{2} [/imath] [imath]\tan 60^{\circ}=[/imath]
